title: Workmaster 25  I welded a quick attach plow first time out.

tasks.task: Install a plow blade on a tractor for snow removal.
subtasks: Purchase a weld-on plate and plow blade.
Weld the plow blade to the weld-on plate.
Attach angle cylinders to the plow blade.
Connect pins to the plow mechanism.
Operate the tractor to position the plow blade.
Test the plow blade by driving over a snow pile.
Adjust the plow blade angle for optimal snow removal.
Drive the tractor with plowed blade to clear parking lot.
Maneuver the tractor around obstacles in the barn.
Inspect welds and adjust hoses for functionality.
Use forward and reverse shuttle to maneuver.
Shift gears without clutching using reverse shuttle.
Clear snow by repeatedly sweeping over the parking lot.
Check for broken parts after use.
Secure hoses for future use.

tasks.task: Install a plow blade on a tractor for snow removal.
subtasks: ** Purchase a weld-on plate and plow blade.
** Weld the plow blade to the weld-on plate.
** Attach angle cylinders to the plow blade for adjustment.
** Secure pins for the plow mechanism.
** Connect the plow to the tractor’s quick hitch.
** Test the plow’s functionality by driving over a snow pile.
** Adjust the plow angle for optimal performance.
** Operate the tractor to clear the parking lot.
** Maneuver the tractor around the barn and other obstacles.
** Check welds and secure hoses after use.
** Use the forward and reverse shuttle to maneuver.
** Shift gears without clutching using the reverse shuttle.
** Clear the parking lot efficiently.
** Inspect welds for integrity.
** Secure hoses to prevent damage.
